alert.note: Alert for Dripping Springs; Pinal, Superstition Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Pinal Counties through 445 PM MST... At 415 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Christmas, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Christmas. This includes AZ Route 77 between mile markers 145 and 165. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
